originalTitle: The two farms in Senegal that supply many of the UK's vegetables
title: The two farms in Senegal that supply many of the UK's vegetables
content: During winter in Britain fresh produce is sent by cargo ship from the West African nation every week.

title: Suspected carbon-monoxide leak kills at least 30 miners in Nigeria, witnesses say
content: The workers are believed to have collapsed after the gas built up in poorly ventilated tunnels.

content: The media regulator said the ban would be in place "until further notice".

content: A Ricardo Calafiori own goal in the 94th minute gives Wolves a point. as the Premier League's bottom side come back from two goals down against leaders Arsenal at Molineux.

title: What Guardiola's old newspaper column reveals about Man City's new tactics
content: Pep Guardiola is using new tactics this season. This is why Manchester City's attack is now so narrow.

originalTitle: 'Bottle word will be used' as Arsenal blow title advantage
title: 'Bottle word will be used' as Arsenal blow title advantage
content: After blowing a two-goal lead to draw against the Premier League's bottom club Wolves, there will be no dodging the questions on whether Arsenal are mentally ready to end their 22-year wait to become champions.
